I have purchased many 100% Rayon dresses and blouses from reputable retailers who are not on Amazon. They breathe, they drape well, they flow. This is not Rayon.  In fact this is the 4th Amazon product I’ve purchased that is not the fabric it states. This feels like a synthetic thin raincoat. It even sounds like a raincoat. If you don’t mind wearing hot synthetics that don’t breathe then you may like it. It looks like the picture, cute. I bought the pink one. But this is the last Amazon garment I will buy due to fraudulent descriptions. It’s a waste of time. Truly Zero stars.  I would hope some law firm would bring a class action lawsuit against Amazon for selling fraudulent items, stolen merchandise, expired cat food, etc. The time wasted returning items…..just GO shopping somewhere. Touch it, feel it, save someone’s job.

评论概述: Poor quality fabric and unrealistic sizing
评论详情: This dress design is adequate; however, the fabric is very thin. Furthermore, the sizing is off. I bought an XL to have “extra room” but the dress fit like a medium. In other words it didn’t fit me. This company uses incorrect size guide. If you’re a size 10/12 an L or XL will fit like a S/M or like a 6/8. Good luck.

First off, I would say size up unless you are going to line dry it. I usually wear a medium and I went up to a large because the first time I got one it shrink literal inches in the dryer. It shake a bit more during the second watch, but now seems stable.  Aside from that, the dress is really perfect. In the summer, it’s regularly over 100° where I live and I’m always trying to find cool clothing. This is probably the most lightweight and cool dress that I own. Very breezy and soft.  It is also getting so many compliments - to a bizarre degree. When I was at Trader Joe’s today, three different random people walked up to me and said how much they liked my dress. It literally has happened every day I have worn it out. I have never had an article of clothing that generated so many compliments.  Well worth the price.
